title: This'll do me
brief_description: Scenes showing the manufacture and use of fibrous plaster products are used to illustrate the various opportunities for employment in the fibrous plaster industry. Shows the manufacture of plaster sheet and cornice moulds and also the making by hand of moulds for commemorative plaques, complicated patterns used in interior design, window display modellings and other materials requiring the work of skilled artists.
